post:
![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/images/logo_invoice.png)

Founded in 2011, DeepNet Solutions is a Web Hosting and VPS provider. We were before know on the name of Gestion DBI. Our mission is to provide virtualization solutions at highly competitive price with the Best Quality! We offer multitude of hosting services like web hosting, game server hosting and of course, VPS hosting.

----------------------------------

Use the exclusive promotion for LowEndTalk : **LET25OFF** (25% OFF Recurring).  
This promotion also apply to our Annual plan... So 15%+25% OFF !!!  
Expiration date: January 30, 2015.

OpenVZ plans:
-----------

### CVZ-128: (Limited time offer)
 
   * 1 CPU Core
   * 128MB Dedicated RAM (256MB Burst RAM)
   * 5GB Storage
   * 500GB @ 1gbps
   * 1 dedicated IPv4
   * DDoS protected
   * Montreal Datacenter  

Price: $6/Semi-Annually or  $10/Annually  (No promo code needed)  
Order link: https://www.clients.deepnetsolutions.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=74


### CVZ-256:
 
   * 1 CPU Core
   * 256MB Dedicated RAM (512MB Burst RAM)
   * 10GB Storage
   * 100 Mbps Unmetered OR 1 Gbps (3TB/month)
   * 1 dedicated IPv4
   * DDoS protected
   * Montreal Datacenter  

Price: $1.88 with promo code (<del>$2.50 normal price</del>)  
Order link: https://www.clients.deepnetsolutions.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45


### CVZ-512:
 
   * 1 CPU Core
   * 512MB Dedicated RAM (1GB Burst RAM)
   * 20GB Storage
   * 100 Mbps Unmetered OR 1 Gbps (3TB/month)
   * 1 dedicated IPv4
   * DDoS protected
   * Montreal Datacenter  

Price: $3.00 with promo code (<del>$4.00 normal price</del>)  
Order link: https://www.clients.deepnetsolutions.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=41


### You can view all our plans here : [All Canada OpenVZ Plans](https://www.clients.deepnetsolutions.com/cart.php?gid=8)

Price: $4.50 with promo code (<del>$6.00 normal price</del>)

Price: $6.75 with promo code (<del>$9.00 normal price</del>)

----------------------------------

We will give free of charge, Comodo Positive SSL! Open a ticket to our Sales department to request yours!  
(While supply last, First arrived, first served.)

   * All our OpenVZ VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
   * KVM VPS support Windows for plan KVM-1024 and higher. 
   * Custom ISO also supported. Contact our technical team.
   * We offer IPv6 for our KVM range as Beta. Contact us to request.
   * Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html

We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: https://www.clients.deepnetsolutions.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=5

You can view all our offers and Web Hosting packages at : [www.deepnetsolutions.com](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com)

- From all DeepNet Solutions staff, Happy New Year!

Regards, David.
